title: PSA: Pings aren't meant for you to be passive-aggressive trash.
body: Stop using enemy is missing ping to question why people are doing what they are doing.

replies.body: At least you can mute them now. It's too bad the offenders have forgotten this though. It got better when muting was first released.
Wait, you can mute individual people's pings now? I thought it was an all-or-nothing deal.

You can mute the sound, you can't mute the icon actually appearing on screen or in chat.

So, the problem's only half solved.

> You can mute the sound, you can't mute the icon actually appearing on screen or in chat.

Uhhhh you're wrong. Press tab. Near the mute button there is a button to mute an individual player's pings. Emotes have a button too.

No kidding. Individual ping SOUNDS. I am talking about currently having the ability to only mute SOUNDS. I'm aware you can mute a specific player's SOUNDS.
 It's the part where the DISPLAYED ping icons are still visible, along with the chat logs, meaning that every time someone gets pissy on my team, the chat log fills with a thousand "Enemy Is MIA" notifications. Which can be a pain in the ass if I'm trying to use chat to communicate with someone else.
wrong, if you mute a players pings on the score tab the icon won't show as well

No, it definitely removes the visuals as well.
There have been plenty of times where I muted the pings of an annoying pinger. After I muted them, there wasn't a single ping from them for the rest of the game. I highly, HIGHYLY doubt it's was because they completely stopped pinging right as I mute them.
lol

I like when I get run over by 4 people botlane, 100% dead, and my support pings my heal about 500 times like I should have used that. Ok buddy. Honestly, as much as Riot supposedly hates Toxicity, they just throw emote/mastery/ping spam in as a way to do it non-verbally.

lol I  have went back to base, because my sight stone and trinket were out of wards and my wards had expired, jungle dies then I get "Lios Ashenblade: Janna <Sightstone 3 charges>" like 4 times, like...ok dude, but you could have put our a ward too, and should have, and I literally was going back FOR WARDS, missing exp and gold when my health and mana were fine
I legit almost banged my head on my desk when Riot announced emotes. I honestly don't know how much weed they smoke at Riot HQ to convince themselves that everyone else is as chill as they are.

Still not as bad as "?"
That's literally what it is

It's literally the same thing in a different format. The morons who used to spam "?" in chat are now just spamming the "Enemy Missing" ping. SSDD

Worst thing is when you're so used to it, you zone out the pings.

Midlaner: ?

10 seconds later, 4-man bot.
Better to use the red ping in river, people don't use that one for toxicity so actually notice it.
Scoring 6 cs as a sup in 5 mins. ?????

the best is when the clown aint nowhere near getting back to lane and throws a tantrum over u last hitting alone in lane while he gone

like he entitled to gold that he physically cant even get lmao
People wouldn't need to misuse pings if they had voice chat
Yeah they could just outright call you garbage then! Problem solved!

Or have insane background noise, be constantly crunching chips, mic feedback, in addition to the whole "GG bot is a feeding noob" nonsense, there is a reason voice chat is done third part,  riot isnt responsible for policing peoples attitudes via discord, so they aren't responsible when you get flamed or harassed there <in a format that is far harder to prove>

Right, which is why CS:GOnis begging to have it removed. Oh wait, that's right, the community will vote lick you out of the pre game lobby for not having a mic because it's THAT ESSENTIAL to coordination
They did say they were adding it, though thankfully only for premades which I'm all for.
Which is good, I mute most my team in most games with voice, because I hate having too much background noise when I am trying to focus

"Hey, you're really over extended, watch the map you are" instead if Q pinging their corpse 20 times. I play CS:GO id much rather tell them to back off the site and stop being a monkey than have to deal with them dead and titled

Yeah but league of legends has a reputation as the most toxic online community in gaming history lol, I would say a good half the games population mutes their whole team at the start of a match, only communicating via pings

Play on a Russian or Chinese server and you'll learn slurs that you didn't know could be imagined. Some of the words for polish people are like the N word and had a gangbang with all the words for Jew, then had it raised by the alcoholic aunt, the c word
Typing that out in chat conveys a completely different message than Q pinging them. If I had to translate it it would probably be something along the lines of "What are you doing you retard?!"

I hate this shit so much. Ping spamming me is the absolute fastest way to make me stop caring about winning this game. Using a system meant for communication to harass teammates pretty much kills all my motivation to play that game, especially if it's more than 1 person doing it. 

Yes, I know you can mute it but the damage is already done.
I'm sorry that I don't have the time to type "You're overextended, watch the map you are, mid is MIA" it's easier to ping your corpse and not kiss CS while you int toplane

See, the thing is while you may think it's great to point out your teammate's mistakes with mia pings, it really isn't. You're still making huge mistakes every second of the game, the only difference is that they're not getting punished. So don't act all high and mighty, actually be respectful and give constructive criticism

Most people, my self included, struggle to take Blane in the moment. Telling someone why they're wrong is essential to the improving of that person. And of myself. I've had plenty of times I've opened my mouth when I was wrong and learned from it.
Yeah except when they get caught out of position and die they already KNOW they did wrong, pointing it out in an obnoxious manner only serves to annoy people further.
As a jungle main I'm used to getting spam pinged for no reason. I instantly mute these people and report them for harassment afterwards.
So what are you doing that you are getting spammed with ? ? ??!?  ? ?

Hitting minions when my ADC is dead.

Somehow being responsible for someone being killed across the map when I'm jungle.

Getting 4 man towerdived because I didn't get any warning that someone was missing on their lane.

Heinous crimes, I know!

To be fair if you're screwing with the wave and causing it to slow push you're actually messing your adc up quite a bit. Last hitting doesn't hurt anyone though.

Edit: not saying you should be ping spammed, just saying it's not harmless either

It's honestly gotten to he point where now when someone starts pinging a lane for "enemy is missing" I can't tell if they're being passive aggressive about the lane not doing well or ACTUALLY using the ping to signal that an enemy is missing.
Voice chat would alleviate that exact issue
Yeah and open up a ton more, this is especially so on servers where not everyone speaks the same language. You don't treat a broken toe with leg amputation.

Anytime someone does this in a passive aggressive way (when it's clearly not them pinging a dead enemy like "LOL WTF WAS THAT ENEMY DOING?") I call them out for it in chat saying "why are you abusing pings to harass others".

I shit you not, 70% of the time they say "lol that's not harassment". They are in actual denial that they are harassing people with that.

Sometimes they even ask "lol abusing pings?" and if I reply "you KNOW that's a missing ping, so why are you misusing it?"

The only replies I get to that are inflammatory ad hominem, like "shh idiot" or "stay bronze" or some shit.

People who abuse pings like this are moronic, in denial, and are too stubborn to realize that they are being toxic. And Riot lets them get away with this too.

After the third time someone does that, I usually just fall back and type something like "no, the enemies aren't missing - they are right there, in front of you".

They mostly shut up after that.
Usually people who use pings to be toxic generally have useless pings so i end up muting their pings most of the time(Thank goodness Riot added that feature).
